text: nimage tilidirali, nim'ma yud'dha sampattinalli aidane ondu bhagavu allahanige, (avana) dutarige, (nim'ma) bandhugalige, anatharige, badavarige mattu prayanikarige seride. Nivu allahanalli nambike ullavaragiddare mattu (satya-mithyagala) pratyekateya dina hagu eradu padegalu edurugonda (badrâ€Œyud'dhada) dina navu nam'ma dasanige nididdaralli (divya sahayadalli) nambike ullavaragiddare (i niyamavannu palisiri). Allahanu ellavannu madaballanu
